hadiths.text: Narrated 'Aisha: A woman from the tribe of Bani Asad was sitting with me and Allah's Apostle (p.b.u.h) came to my house and said, "Who is this?" I said, "(She is) So and so. She does not sleep at night because she is engaged in prayer." The Prophet (ﷺ) said disapprovingly: Do (good) deeds which is within your capacity as Allah never gets tired of giving rewards till you get tired of doing good deeds

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ التَّشْدِيدِ فِي الْعِبَادَةِ
chapter.eng-name: It is disliked to exaggerate in matters of worship
